verses.verse: Now these are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>, who is Edom <S%H123><s%>.

Esau <S%H6215><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his wives <S%H802><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>; Adah <S%H5711><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Elon <S%H356><s%> the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and Aholibamah <S%H173><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Anah <S%H6034><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zibeon <S%H6649><s%> the Hivite <S%H2340><s%>;
And Bashemath <S%H1315><s%> Ishmael's <S%H3458><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%>, sister <S%H269><s%> of Nebajoth <S%H5032><s%>.
And Adah <S%H5711><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> to Esau <S%H6215><s%> Eliphaz <S%H464><s%>; and Bashemath <S%H1315><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> Reuel <S%H7467><s%>;

And Aholibamah <S%H173><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> Jeush <S%H3274><s%>, and Jaalam <S%H3281><s%>, and Korah <S%H7141><s%>: these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>, which were born <S%H3205><s%> unto him in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>.

And Esau <S%H6215><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> his wives <S%H802><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and his daughters <S%H1323><s%>, and all the persons <S%H5315><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%>, and his cattle <S%H4735><s%>, and all his beasts <S%H929><s%>, and all his substance <S%H7075><s%>, which he had got <S%H7408><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>; and went <S%H3212><s%> into the country <S%H776><s%> from the face <S%H6440><s%> of his brother <S%H251><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>. persons: Heb. souls

For their riches <S%H7399><s%> were more <S%H7227><s%> than that they might dwell <S%H3427><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>; and the land <S%H776><s%> wherein they were strangers <S%H4033><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not bear <S%H5375><s%> them because <S%H6440><s%> of their cattle <S%H4735><s%>.
Thus dwelt <S%H3427><s%> Esau <S%H6215><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>: Esau <S%H6215><s%> is Edom <S%H123><s%>.
And these are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of the Edomites <S%H123><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%>: the Edomites: Heb. Edom

These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of Esau's <S%H6215><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>; Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adah <S%H5711><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>, Reuel <S%H7467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bashemath <S%H1315><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> were Teman <S%H8487><s%>, Omar <S%H201><s%>, Zepho <S%H6825><s%>, and Gatam <S%H1609><s%>, and Kenaz <S%H7073><s%>. Zepho: or, Zephi

And Timna <S%H8555><s%> was concubine <S%H6370><s%> to Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> Esau's <S%H6215><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>; and she bare <S%H3205><s%> to Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> Amalek <S%H6002><s%>: these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adah <S%H5711><s%> Esau's <S%H6215><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>.

And these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel <S%H7467><s%>; Nahath <S%H5184><s%>, and Zerah <S%H2226><s%>, Shammah <S%H8048><s%>, and Mizzah <S%H4199><s%>: these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bashemath <S%H1315><s%> Esau's <S%H6215><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>.

And these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aholibamah <S%H173><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Anah <S%H6034><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zibeon <S%H6649><s%>, Esau's <S%H6215><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>: and she bare <S%H3205><s%> to Esau <S%H6215><s%> Jeush <S%H3274><s%>, and Jaalam <S%H3281><s%>, and Korah <S%H7141><s%>.

These were dukes <S%H441><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>: the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> son of Esau <S%H6215><s%>; duke <S%H441><s%> Teman <S%H8487><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Omar <S%H201><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Zepho <S%H6825><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Kenaz <S%H7073><s%>,

Duke <S%H441><s%> Korah <S%H7141><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Gatam <S%H1609><s%>, and duke <S%H441><s%> Amalek <S%H6002><s%>: these are the dukes <S%H441><s%> that came of Eliphaz <S%H464><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>; these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adah <S%H5711><s%>.

And these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel <S%H7467><s%> Esau's <S%H6215><s%> son <S%H1121><s%>; duke <S%H441><s%> Nahath <S%H5184><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Zerah <S%H2226><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Shammah <S%H8048><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Mizzah <S%H4199><s%>: these are the dukes <S%H441><s%> that came of Reuel <S%H7467><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>; these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bashemath <S%H1315><s%> Esau's <S%H6215><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>.

And these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aholibamah <S%H173><s%> Esau's <S%H6215><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>; duke <S%H441><s%> Jeush <S%H3266><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Jaalam <S%H3281><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Korah <S%H7141><s%>: these were the dukes <S%H441><s%> that came of Aholibamah <S%H173><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Anah <S%H6034><s%>, Esau's <S%H6215><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>.
These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%>, who is Edom <S%H123><s%>, and these are their dukes <S%H441><s%>.

These are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Seir <S%H8165><s%> the Horite <S%H2752><s%>, who inhabited <S%H3427><s%> the land <S%H776><s%>; Lotan <S%H3877><s%>, and Shobal <S%H7732><s%>, and Zibeon <S%H6649><s%>, and Anah <S%H6034><s%>,

And Dishon <S%H1787><s%>, and Ezer <S%H687><s%>, and Dishan <S%H1789><s%>: these are the dukes <S%H441><s%> of the Horites <S%H2752><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Seir <S%H8165><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Lotan <S%H3877><s%> were Hori <S%H2753><s%> and Hemam <S%H1967><s%>; and Lotan's <S%H3877><s%> sister <S%H269><s%> was Timna <S%H8555><s%>. Hemam: or, Homam

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Shobal <S%H7732><s%> were these; Alvan <S%H5935><s%>, and Manahath <S%H4506><s%>, and Ebal <S%H5858><s%>, Shepho <S%H8195><s%>, and Onam <S%H208><s%>. Alvan: or, Alian Shepho: or, Shephi

And these are the children <S%H1121><s%> of Zibeon <S%H6649><s%>; both Ajah <S%H345><s%>, and Anah <S%H6034><s%>: this was that Anah <S%H6034><s%> that found <S%H4672><s%> the mules <S%H3222><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, as he fed <S%H7462><s%> the asses <S%H2543><s%> of Zibeon <S%H6649><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Anah <S%H6034><s%> were these; Dishon <S%H1787><s%>, and Aholibamah <S%H173><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Anah <S%H6034><s%>.
And these are the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dishon <S%H1787><s%>; Hemdan <S%H2533><s%>, and Eshban <S%H790><s%>, and Ithran <S%H3506><s%>, and Cheran <S%H3763><s%>. Hemdan: or, Amram
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Ezer <S%H687><s%> are these; Bilhan <S%H1092><s%>, and Zaavan <S%H2190><s%>, and Akan <S%H6130><s%>. Akan: or, Jakan
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Dishan <S%H1789><s%> are these; Uz <S%H5780><s%>, and Aran <S%H765><s%>.

These are the dukes <S%H441><s%> that came of the Horites <S%H2752><s%>; duke <S%H441><s%> Lotan <S%H3877><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Shobal <S%H7732><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Zibeon <S%H6649><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Anah <S%H6034><s%>,

Duke <S%H441><s%> Dishon <S%H1787><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Ezer <S%H687><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Dishan <S%H1789><s%>: these are the dukes <S%H441><s%> that came of Hori <S%H2753><s%>, among their dukes <S%H441><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Seir <S%H8165><s%>.

And these are the kings <S%H4428><s%> that reigned <S%H4427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> there reigned <S%H4427><s%> any king <S%H4428><s%> over the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And Bela <S%H1106><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in Edom <S%H123><s%>: and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> was Dinhabah <S%H1838><s%>.
And Bela <S%H1106><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Jobab <S%H3103><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> of Bozrah <S%H1224><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead.
And Jobab <S%H3103><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Husham <S%H2367><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Temani <S%H8489><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead.

And Husham <S%H2367><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Hadad <S%H1908><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bedad <S%H911><s%>, who smote <S%H5221><s%> Midian <S%H4080><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead: and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> was Avith <S%H5762><s%>.
And Hadad <S%H1908><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Samlah <S%H8072><s%> of Masrekah <S%H4957><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead.
And Samlah <S%H8072><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Saul <S%H7586><s%> of Rehoboth <S%H7344><s%> by the river <S%H5104><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead.
And Saul <S%H7586><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Baalhanan <S%H1177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Achbor <S%H5907><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead.

And Baalhanan <S%H1177><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Achbor <S%H5907><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>, and Hadar <S%H1924><s%> reigned <S%H4427><s%> in his stead: and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> was Pau <S%H6464><s%>; and his wife's <S%H802><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Mehetabel <S%H4105><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Matred <S%H4308><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Mezahab <S%H4314><s%>. Hadar, Pau: or, Hadad, Pai: after his death was an Aristocracy

And these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the dukes <S%H441><s%> that came of Esau <S%H6215><s%>, according to their families <S%H4940><s%>, after their places <S%H4725><s%>, by their names <S%H8034><s%>; duke <S%H441><s%> Timnah <S%H8555><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Alvah <S%H5933><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Jetheth <S%H3509><s%>, Alvah: or, Aliah
Duke <S%H441><s%> Aholibamah <S%H173><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Elah <S%H425><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Pinon <S%H6373><s%>,
Duke <S%H441><s%> Kenaz <S%H7073><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Teman <S%H8487><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Mibzar <S%H4014><s%>,

Duke <S%H441><s%> Magdiel <S%H4025><s%>, duke <S%H441><s%> Iram <S%H5902><s%>: these be the dukes <S%H441><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, according to their habitations <S%H4186><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of their possession <S%H272><s%>: he is Esau <S%H6215><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of the Edomites <S%H123><s%>. the Edomites: Heb. Edom
